FuncDef: The display transfer-mode command displays the transfer mode of a 10 GE LAN/WAN interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The interfaces at both ends of a 10GE LAN/WAN link must have the same transfer mode. To check the transfer mode of a 10GE LAN/WAN interface, run the display transfer-mode command. The command output helps locate faults and analyze problems.
